name: eventric-store-specs
author: eFa Team <team@efa-gmbh.com>
description: This repo contains the specs for the interface of eventric stores, i.e. the inmemory store implementation inside eventric (https://github.com/efacilitation/eventric/tree/master/src/store/inmemory) and the mongodb store implementation (https://github.com/efacilitation/eventric-store-mongodb).
